targets.expr: (node_filesystem_size_bytes{instance="$instance",  project_name="aspernode", project_id="16", fstype=~"ext.*|xfs",mountpoint !~".*pod.*"}-node_filesystem_free_bytes{instance="$instance", project_name="aspernode", project_id="16", fstype=~"ext.*|xfs",mountpoint !~".*pod.*"}) *100/(node_filesystem_avail_bytes {instance="$instance",fstype=~"ext.*|xfs",mountpoint !~".*pod.*"}+(node_filesystem_size_bytes{instance="$instance",fstype=~"ext.*|xfs",mountpoint !~".*pod.*"}-node_filesystem_free_bytes{instance="$instance", project_name="aspernode", project_id="16", fstype=~"ext.*|xfs",mountpoint !~".*pod.*"}))

panels.description: Busy state of all CPU cores together (5 min average)

panels.description: Busy state of all CPU cores together (15 min average)

targets.expr: ((node_memory_MemTotal_bytes{instance="$instance",job="${JOB_NAME}", project_name="aspernode", project_id="16"} - node_memory_MemFree_bytes{instance="$instance",job="${JOB_NAME}", project_name="aspernode", project_id="16"}) / (node_memory_MemTotal_bytes{instance="$node",job="${JOB_NAME}", project_name="aspernode", project_id="16"} )) * 100
